extendedInfo.description: This mobile application is a companion app for InsperityTM ExpensAbleÂ® Office*.  ExpensAble Office is a convenient, money-saving, expense reporting tool designed for individuals and small businesses.As an ExpensAble Office customer, you can use the mobile application to: â¢	Create individual expensesâ¢	Capture receipts with your deviceâs cameraâ¢	Add expense detailsâ¢	Customize merchant and city listsâ¢	Convert foreign currencies using built-in, real-time currency converterâ¢	Autocomplete your location using location servicesâ¢	Send expenses and photo receipts to your personal ExpensAble Office âE-binâ Use the mobile application, and you can snap photos of receipts right at the point of purchase and send them to ExpensAble Office. Once you open the ExpensAble Office software to create your expense report, your mobile transactions are downloaded into an electronic bin where they are ready to be added to your reports. You can even use the feature if you have no connectivity at the time. Expenses are simply saved in your unsent list. To install this mobile app, you will need the email address and registration code you used when you installed ExpensAble Office.  For more information about ExpensAble Office and other automated expense management solutions for any size business, visit http://www.insperity.com/products/expense-managementThis application supports Android version 2.2 and up. Screen resolutions supported are Normal, Large and XLarge. MDPI, HDPI, XHDPI screen pixel densities are supported. Testing was conducted on the following devices:-HTC Aria-HTC Desire-HTC Inspire-Samsung Galaxy Nexus-Samsung SII-Samsung SIII-Google Nexus 7 Tablet-Google Nexus S-Motorola Milestone-Motorola Droid X If you find issues with the application we ask that you call our free customer support line and talk with our team rather than give us a bad review. We want to help you.*If you are an ExpensAble Corporate customer, please install the mobile application titled ExpensAble Mobile; this application is not designed to work with ExpensAble Corporate.

reviews.title: Greatest expense management tool
reviews.comment: This is the best expense management tool I have ever used.  I get to track all of my expenses from my phone and send it to my work computer.  Very  easy to use and convenient.  Thanks for inventing something for us small business owners that makes life so much easier.
reviews.author: Nathan M Jones

reviews.title: Can\'t even log in
reviews.comment: Can\'t even log in. Says my email is an invalid format. There is a dash in my email address, perhaps it does not like that. Unusable!
reviews.author: Jeff Golden
